titleStmt.title: Doxologia; or Glory to the Father the Churches hymne, reduced to glorifying of the Trinity, in life, the Christians dutie, at Edinburth, by Will. Annand, M.A. one of the ministers of that city, late of Univers. Coll. Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Annand, William, 1633-1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by I.D. and are to be sold by George Sawbridge, on Ludgate-hill, at the Blew Bible,

notesStmt.note: Final leaf bears vertical half-title: Annands Doxologia:.
Reproduction of the original in the Aberdeen University Library.
